content.en: Wireless resource optimization: Researchers are using algorithms to optimize resource allocation and maximize system throughput in wireless-powered Internet of Things (IoT) networks. These algorithms ensure fairness by maximizing the sum rate of backscatter data and transmission rate. They also optimize power beacon transmission power and backscatter reflection coefficients to solve the max-min fairness problem in energy-efficient resource allocation. Overall, algorithms play a crucial role in achieving optimal resource allocation and maximizing throughput in various types of wireless-powered communication networks.
content.da: Trådløs ressourceoptimering: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at optimere ressourcefordeling og maksimere systemgennemstrømning i trådløst drevne Internet of Things (IoT) netværk. Disse algoritmer sikrer retfærdighed ved at maksimere summen af backscatter data og transmissionshastighed. De optimerer også energiudsendelsens transmissionskraft og backscatter refleksionskoefficienter for at løse max-min retfærdighedsproblemet i energieffektiv ressourceallokering. Overordnet spiller algoritmer en afgørende rolle i at opnå optimal ressourcefordeling og maksimere gennemstrømning i forskellige typer af trådløst drevne kommunikationsnetværk.
